raise.name: Rob
raise.message: It was great speaking with you at Tech Week. I hope the remainder of your time at the hiring fair wasn't too overwhleming! I was reaching out because we talked about potential Front End Developer roles and wanted to keep that conversation going. Below are a list of links to my various social media sites, my personal website, and my resume. If you are interested, we can meet for lunch or coffee to go over some of my projects and experience. Hope you have an incredible 4th of July and I look forward to hearing from you!

robert-half.name: Christopher (and Mark)
robert-half.message: It was great seeing you at Tech Week! Hope the remainder of your time there wasn't too overwhleming! You asked me to remind you about a role that had the initials 'SBB' (or something of that nature). For TechWeek, I had created this very angular app to show recruiters and companies alike of my abilities, and since you were there, I figured I would send it to you as well! Hope you had an incredible Pride and have a happy 4th of July! (feel free to forward this link to Mark as well!)

akamai.name: Carrie
akamai.message: It was great speaking with you at Tech Week. I hope the remainder of your time at the hiring fair wasn't too overwhleming! I was reaching out because we talked about potential Front End Developer roles and wanted to keep that conversation going. Below are a list of links to my various social media sites, my personal website, and my resume. I know that you mentioned that the roles in Chicago are primarily sales, but I would be open to talk about open positions on the west coast! If you are interested, we can meet for lunch or coffee to go over some of my projects and experience. Hope you have an incredible 4th of July and I look forward to hearing from you!

workbridge.message: It was great to speak with all of you today about potential Front End Dev positions. I had created this simple Angular app to send follow-ups to various people I had met with at Tech Week, and didn't want to forget you all! Hope you all have an incredible 4th of July and I look forward to hearing about potential oppenings!
